summary: An ordinance granting Seattle Goodwill Industries, a non-profit corporation, and its successors and assigns, the right to construct, maintain and operate a building and structure for a distance of approximately 112 feet over the alley lying westerly of Lots 16, 17, 18 and 19, Block 36, Rainier Boulevard 5th Addition; and specifying the conditions of the grant; and providing for the acceptance and a bond.
